original_text: The God that Jacob's descendants worship is not like those idols. He created everything. He chose the Israelites as the people who would belong to him. His name is the Lord Almighty. God will soon punish the people of Judah The God that Jacob's descendants worship
korean_text: 야곱의 분깃은 이같지 아니하시니 그는 만물의 조성자요 이스라엘은 그의 기업의 지파라 그 이름은 만군의 여호와시니라

sentences.original_text: The God that Jacob's descendants worship
as the people who would belong to him.
His name is the Lord Almighty.
God will soon punish the people of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 곧 유다 백성을 징벌하실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: The God that Jacob's descendants worship
